FFlagLuauTypeCheckerVectorLerp_Staged.purpose: Helps developers write more accurate code, reducing errors when moving objects smoothly.

DFFlagInferredCrashReportToBacktraceRegi.purpose: Makes it easier for developers to fix issues, leading to a more stable gaming experience.

FFlagAXCategoryPillColorAnimation.mechanism: Adds animated color changes to category indicators in the user interface.

FFlagLuauOccursCheckInCommit.mechanism: Implements checks during code commits to catch potential issues early.

FFlagAXDisableGamepadPanning.purpose: Prevents unwanted camera movements, enhancing control for players.

FFlagProfilePlatformEnableClickToCopyUse.mechanism: Allows users to click on usernames to copy them to the clipboard.
FFlagProfilePlatformEnableClickToCopyUse.purpose: Makes it easier for players to share usernames without typing them out.

FFlagVideoGamePreviewSessionTracking.mechanism: Monitors player engagement during video game previews.
FFlagVideoGamePreviewSessionTracking.purpose: Provides insights to developers on player interest and behavior during previews.

FFlagUIBloxTruncateExperienceTileMetadat.mechanism: Shortens the text displayed in the footer of experience tiles to fit better.
FFlagUIBloxTruncateExperienceTileMetadat.purpose: Improves the visual appearance of experience tiles by preventing text overflow.

FFlagPlaceVersionHistoryMetadataRCC_Stag.purpose: Enhances the experience of viewing and managing place version histories for developers.

FFlagStudioActionsMultiplePayloads.purpose: Streamlines the workflow for developers, making it faster to execute multiple changes.

FFlagAXMigrateResellersCardToAutofocus.mechanism: Changes the focus behavior of reseller cards to automatically highlight them.
FFlagAXMigrateResellersCardToAutofocus.purpose: Makes it easier for players to interact with reseller cards, improving user experience.

FFlagRemoveUpdatePromptChild_Staged.purpose: Reduces interruptions for players by not prompting them to update child objects.

FFlagSTM6819Enabled.mechanism: Activates a new system for managing player data more efficiently.
FFlagSTM6819Enabled.purpose: Improves game performance and player experience by handling data faster.
